thread.title: Ground News - Media: Islamists plan attacks against Christmas church services

author: berlingske.dk
title: Ground News - Media: Islamists plan attacks against Christmas church services
text:
Summary by berlingske.dk Police in both Cologne and Vienna have stepped up security at cathedrals. Austrian police see elevated terror risk. Share menu More
Filters 3 Articles 3 Articles All Left Center Right
Adevarul Islamists planned terror attacks in Cologne, Vienna and Madrid during Christmas services Several arrests have been made in Germany and Austria, reports the Focus-Online portal.
2 hours ago 路 Romania Read Full Article
Adevarul
Islamists planned terror attacks in Cologne, Vienna and Madrid during Christmas services Several arrests have been made in Germany and Austria, reports the Focus-Online portal.
2 hours ago 路 Romania Read Full Article focus.de Terrorists were probably planning attacks on churches in Cologne, Vienna and Madrid An Islamist terrorist cell is said to have planned several attacks in Cologne, Vienna and Madrid. The goals could also have been Christmas services. There were therefore several arrests in Germany and Austria. A sniffer dog is used to search for explosives at Cologne Cathedral.
3 hours ago Read Full Article
